page.title: 05CHURCH YARD-EAST CARLTON
page.content: This is a haven for wild flowers growing undisturbed among the tranquility of the gravestones.The church has to rely on voluntary help to cut the grass and the availability of this is not frequent enough,resulting in long grass and a multitude of wild flowers such as wood sorrel covering the ground like a white carpet among the long grass,Ground Ivy,White Campion, Forget-me-not,masses of red and white Clover,Silverweed,Cowslip, Ox-eye daisy White Dead Nettle, Buttercup,Birds-foot trefoil,Dandelion Speedwell,lesser Bindweed and Scarlet Pimpernell.The profusion of flowers are attracting every kind of insect such as bumble bee,wasp,fly,grasshopper,ant, beetle and butterfly.
